message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $150.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to consider $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. My revised offer is $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $135 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to consider $125.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. My revised offer is $130.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm getting closer to my budget, but I'm still not sure if $130 is the right price for me. I'm willing to consider $122.50.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My revised offer is $129.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure if $129 is the right price for me. I'm willing to consider $125.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $128. I've made several concessions already, and I need to get closer to my minimum price. My revised offer is $128.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not sure if $128 is the right price for me. I'm willing to consider $126, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
